title: Make sure your copy is v1.00
desc:
Other versions of the game will not work and will most likely cause a crash.

If you wish to downgrade a later version to a compatible version download a downgrader from here.

title: Extract mod into GTA file folder
desc:
Find your game files and extract downloaded archive there.

It's usually in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\ folder.

If you have Steam version you shoud check C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\

title: Get yourself an Ultimate ASI Loader
desc:
If you haven't using Ultimate ASI Loader, you can download it from here. You'll need to extract it in GTA folder, as you did with Rainbomizer.

Ultimate ASI Loader is necessary for Rainbomizer to work property.
